headline.main: Liver Transplant Surgical Pioneer Dr. Thomas Starzl Dies
headline.print_headline: Liver Transplant Surgical Pioneer Dr. Thomas Starzl Dies

lead_paragraph: A Syrian pilot whose plane crashed in Turkey on Saturday said in an initial statement to Turkish authorities that his aircraft was shot down on its way to strike rural areas near Idlib, which is in northern Syria, state-run Anadolu agency reported on Sunday.
